EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-21-CAE-Denver-092617-5.EM-2017-08-30-CAE Denver #4
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register: Rockies vs Marlins
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We have a limited number of seats left and we hope you join us this Tuesday, September 26th, as the Rockies take on the Marlins at Coors Field.
We’re looking forward to good drinks, great food, and our community of awesome technologists for an evening of baseball and networking.
Colorado Rockies vs Miami Marlins <[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]>
Where: Coors Field 2001 Blake St., Denver, CO 80205 Tuesday, September 26th 6:40pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]>
Last Call - RSVP Today <[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]>. Please reach out to megan.gay@turbonomic.com or your account executives with any further questions.
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
